title: When A Destructive Wolf Joins An Escape Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Horror   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Calm Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Episodic   Ghosts   Lazy Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Unlimited Flow
author: Luo Yancheng   落雁城
description:
Gu Muzhi was a demon who had snuck into the human world to eat, drink, and play.

He found that the human world was simply paradise compared to purgatory, which never saw the light of day.

One day, he accidentally entered an unlimited flow game…

Gu Muzhi: The ghosts here taste really good.

The ghosts there: ! ! !

The players there: ? ? ?

That day, the ghosts learned to fear Gu Mozhi as he hunted them down for their delicious taste. As for the players…the players were still trying to rebuild their three worldviews.>
